::Orchestra::

        "That'll do," Orchestra said.

        Orchestra followed Zardus, stopping once to look back at Chaostaur.

::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus nods, looking briefly to make sure there was no one waiting outside =
the island.

"Yes, lets go to the conference room," he says, turning and walking toward =
the Iron Fist, motioning for Chaostaur to follow.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer watches the shuttle approaching the Iron Fist, tapping his comm t=
o send a message to Punch.

"Punch, can you lower the defences so that the shuttle approaching can ente=
r? I'm bringing in some new recruits."
